translation.text:
Due to track equipment repairs at Bondi Junction and a train with a mechanical issue at Central earlier some services may experience delays of up to 10 minutes. Some stopping patterns and platforms may change at short notice. A frequent service is currently being maintained. Please listen to announcements check information screens or transport apps for further information.

Central Due to a train requiring mechanical repairs at Central.
Due to a train requiring mechanical repairs at Central.
Due to a train requiring mechanical repairs earlier.

Central Due to track equipment repairs at Bondi Junction. Customers at stations from Bondi Junction to Town Hall, please board the next T4 Eastern Suburbs & Illawarra Line train towards Wolli Creek, and change at Wolli Creek to connect with this service.
Please allow additional travel time due to signal equipment repairs at Mt Victoria earlier.
Central Due to track equipment repairs at Bondi Junction.
Redfern Due to track equipment repairs at Bondi Junction. Customer for stations between Central and Bondi Junction, please proceed to platform 11 and board the next service towards Bondi Junction.
Due to track equipment repairs at Bondi Junction.
due to signal equipment repairs at Waratah.

Until Wednesday 9 September the lift that goes from the concourse to street level will be closed for maintenance. If you require a lift or easy access you may wish to consider using Central as an alternative. If you require further assistance please see station staff or call 8337 8400.
The lift between the concourse and platform 5 is temporarily out of service.
The lift between the concourse and platform 4 is temporarily out of service. If you require assistance, please ask staff or phone 9563 7273.
The lift between the concourse and Railway Parade is temporarily out of service. If you require assistance, please ask staff or phone 9563 7273.
The lift between platforms 1/2 and the footbridge is closed for upgrade work until 22 September 2020. If you require assistance, please ask staff or call 4349 9110.
The lift between the concourse and the northern carpark on Railway Terrace is temporarily out of service. For assistance ask station staff or call 9851 7244.

There are changes to Platforms 16 and 17 at Central Station due to Sydney Metro construction works. Hoarding for the Central Walk excavation work has moved from the middle of the platform to the southern end of the platform. Temporary concrete ramps connect the existing platform floor surface and the new concrete floor surface areas. For your safety, please move carefully along the platform and follow directions from staff. If you are travelling to Central Station and require assistance to alight from Platforms 16 and 17, please board via the front door of the fourth train carriage.   For more information about the Sydney Metro construction works visit sydneymetro.info.

From Saturday 25 July to Sunday 13 September: the Suburban Tunnel will be temporarily closed for Sydney Metro construction works. Access for Platforms 16 to 23 is only via the Northern Concourse or Southern Tunnel during this period. You can view a map of the station here https://transportnsw.info/media/4930/central-station-map.pdf.

There are changes to Platforms 18 and 19 at Central Station due to Sydney Metro construction works.   Hoarding for the Central Walk excavation work has moved from the middle of the platform to the southern end of the platform.  Temporary concrete ramps connect the existing platform floor surface and the new concrete surface areas. For your safety, please move carefully along the platform and follow directions from staff.   For more information about the Sydney Metro construction works visit sydneymetro.info.

From 10pm Friday 14 August to 4am Monday 17 August: the stairs, escalators and lift between the Grand Concourse and Northern Concourse at Central Station will be closed for Sydney Metro construction works. Alternative stairs, escalators and lift are available outside the Opal gates. Please follow the signs and staff directions. If you need assistance, see station staff.  For more information about the Sydney Metro construction works visit sydneymetro.info.

From Monday 10th August, station upgrade works will commence and run for a period of approximately 6 weeks. Construction includes the building of new ramps and link bridges. During this time there will be `stair access only¿ to/from platform 1. Customers requiring ramp access will be required to make alternative arrangements. For assistance please call Fairy Meadow Station on 02 4223 5582.

From Wednesday 10 June to Wednesday 9 September the lift that goes from the concourse to street level will be closed for maintenance. If you require a lift or easy access you may wish to consider using Central as an alternative. If you require further assistance please see station staff or call 8337 8400.

During the current upgrade of Mittagong Station access points to the station have changed.  Entry/exit to the station via Regent St is through the Southern/Moss Vale end of the station building.  Entry/exit to the station via Railway Pde is through the Southern/Moss Vale end of the shelter on the platform. Please allow additional time to access the station as a reduced number of parking spaces are available during the upgrade.

New Metro Platforms are being constructed on platforms 1 & 2 at Sydenham Station. T3 Bankstown Line services to the City operate from platform 3 & T3 Bankstown Line services to Lidcombe and Liverpool operate from platform 4. Platform 4, 5 & 6 upgrade works - A new Metro concourse is also being constructed at the Northern end of the station. While the concourse is being installed, please board and alight from the first 5 carriages of the train on platforms 4 & 6 and the last 6 carriages of the train on platform 5. If you need help, please see staff at the station. For more information on these upgrades, please see sydneymetro.info
